items.sentence: Tom and I are planning to go to Boston next autumn.
Tom and Mary both want to eat strawberry ice cream.
I hope that I haven\'t said anything inappropriate.
How can you be certain you haven\'t made a mistake?
I figure we have a day or two before Tom gets here.
I forgot to mail that letter you wanted me to mail.
Tom found some bubblegum and bought it for his son.
Not only can\'t I tell Tom, I can\'t even tell you.
Tom would\'ve done that by himself if he could\'ve.
I\'m going to do my homework as soon as I get home.
